explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning methods in multifactor stock strategy.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (support vector regression, ridge regression, linear regression) are all supervised learning techniques.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on regression methods (support vector regression, ridge regression, linear regression) for predicting portfolio returns.

explanations.SVM: Support vector regression (SVR) is a method derived from support vector machines (SVM), hence SVM is relevant.
